2025-06-30 09:46:54.486 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (38ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Users" AS u
    WHERE u."Email" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS u0
LEFT JOIN "Posts" AS p ON u0."Email" = p."UserEmail"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON u0."Email" = c."UserEmail"
ORDER BY u0."Email", p."Id"

) AS u0

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserEmail", c.iseditied, p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

2025-06-30 14:52:40.505 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (25ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

) AS u0

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."createdAt", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt0", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"

    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s

    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."createdAt", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt0", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

2025-06-30 15:00:14.422 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (3ms) [Parameters=[@__key_0='?' (DbType = Guid)], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT s."Id", s."Content", s."IsDeleted", s."Slug", s."Status", s."Title", s."UserEmail", s."createdAt", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", s0."Name", s."Bio", s."CreatedAt0", s."IsDeleted0", s."IsSuspended", s."Location", s."Name", s."PasswordHash", s."ProfileImage", s."Role", s."Status0", s."SuspendedUntil", s."SuspensionReason", s."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    WHERE u."Email" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS u0
LEFT JOIN "Posts" AS p ON u0."Email" = p."UserEmail"

FROM (
    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

To identify the query that's triggering this warning call 'ConfigureWarnings(w => w.Throw(RelationalEventId.MultipleCollectionIncludeWarning))'.

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

2025-06-30 21:15:06.498 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (38ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT u0."Email", u0."Bio", u0."CreatedAt", u0."IsDeleted", u0."IsSuspended", u0."Location", u0."Name", u0."PasswordHash", u0."ProfileImage", u0."Role", u0."Status", u0."SuspendedUntil", u0."SuspensionReason", u0."Website", p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", c."Id", c."Content", c."CreatedAt", c."IsDeleted", c."PostId", c."Status", c."UserEmail", c.iseditied
FROM (
    SELECT u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Users" AS u
    WHERE u."Email" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS u0
LEFT JOIN "Posts" AS p ON u0."Email" = p."UserEmail"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c ON u0."Email" = c."UserEmail"
ORDER BY u0."Email", p."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p

2025-06-30 21:31:59.492 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (19ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p

LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

2025-06-30 22:27:55.033 +05:30 [INF] Executed DbCommand (9ms) [Parameters=[], CommandType='"Text"', CommandTimeout='30']
SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"

FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"

) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"

    SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt" AS "CreatedAt0", u."IsDeleted" AS "IsDeleted0", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status" AS "Status0", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website"
    FROM "Posts" AS p
    INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
    WHERE p."Id" = @__key_0
    LIMIT 2
) AS s
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s0 ON s."Id" = s0."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON s."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON s."Id" = c0."PostId"
ORDER BY s."Id", s."Email", s0."CategoriesId", s0."PostsId", s0."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"

SELECT p."Id", p."Content", p."IsDeleted", p."Slug", p."Status", p."Title", p."UserEmail", p."Views", p."createdAt", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", s."Name", u."Bio", u."CreatedAt", u."IsDeleted", u."IsSuspended", u."Location", u."Name", u."PasswordHash", u."ProfileImage", u."Role", u."Status", u."SuspendedUntil", u."SuspensionReason", u."Website", i."Id", i."Content", i."IsDeleted", i."Name", i."PostId", i."UploadedAt", c0."Id", c0."Content", c0."CreatedAt", c0."IsDeleted", c0."PostId", c0."Status", c0."UserEmail", c0.iseditied
FROM "Posts" AS p
INNER JOIN "Users" AS u ON p."UserEmail" = u."Email"
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT p0."CategoriesId", p0."PostsId", c."Id", c."Name"
    FROM "PostCategories" AS p0
    INNER JOIN "Categories" AS c ON p0."CategoriesId" = c."Id"
) AS s ON p."Id" = s."PostsId"
LEFT JOIN "Images" AS i ON p."Id" = i."PostId"
LEFT JOIN "Comments" AS c0 ON p."Id" = c0."PostId"
WHERE NOT (p."IsDeleted")
ORDER BY p."Id", u."Email", s."CategoriesId", s."PostsId", s."Id", i."Id"
